<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=701) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 225 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6)

**Prerequisites**
Wisdom 14

</column>

---

You cast spells like a druid. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You can prepare two common cantrips each day from the [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) spell list in this book or any other primal cantrips you learn or discover. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for primal spells. Your key spellcasting ability for druid archetype spells is Wisdom, and they are primal druid spells.

 You learn the [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23) language, and you are bound by the druid's anathema.

 Choose a [druidic order](/classes/druid/druidic-orders). You become a member of that order and are also bound by its specific anathema, allowing you to take the order's feats. You become trained in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) and your order's associated skill; for each of these skills in which you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of order.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the druid archetype.

<title level="2">Druid Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=702), [Basic Wilding](/Feats.aspx?ID=703), [Cunning Trickster Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3433), [Emancipator's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3434), [Grand Medic's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3435), [Order Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=704), [Protective Spirit Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3436), [Sky Master Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3437), [Stalking Feline Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3438), [Storyteller's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3439), [Thick Hide Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3440), [Tireless Guide's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3441), [Vigilant Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3442)
name: Druid Dedication
